user_stories.title: As a strategy designer, I want to define a new trading strategy with its parameters so that I can store it in the system for later execution.
user_stories.description: This story focuses on the ability to create new trading strategies by specifying key attributes such as strategy name, description, entry conditions, exit conditions, and risk management rules. The system should allow for defining various parameter types (e.g., numeric, boolean, string) and their default values.
acceptance_criteria: A strategy designer can create a new strategy with a unique name and description.
A strategy designer can specify entry and exit conditions for the strategy.
A strategy designer can define risk management rules (e.g., stop-loss, take-profit).
The system validates strategy parameters before saving.

tasks.title: Develop strategy data model
tasks.description: Design the database schema for storing strategy details including name, description, entry/exit conditions, and parameters.

tasks.title: Implement API endpoint for strategy creation
tasks.description: Create a RESTful API endpoint to receive and process new strategy definitions.

tasks.title: Integrate with database for persistence
tasks.description: Ensure the created strategy data is correctly saved to the database.

tasks.title: Add input validation for strategy parameters
tasks.description: Implement server-side validation for all incoming strategy data to ensure data integrity.

user_stories.title: As a strategy designer, I want to retrieve an existing trading strategy by its ID or name so that I can view or modify its details.
user_stories.description: This story enables users to fetch specific trading strategies from the database for review or subsequent updates. It should support retrieval by a unique identifier (ID) and also by the strategy's name for convenience.
acceptance_criteria: A strategy designer can retrieve a strategy using its unique ID.
A strategy designer can retrieve a strategy using its name (assuming uniqueness or handling multiple results).
The system returns all defined parameters and conditions for the retrieved strategy.
If a strategy is not found, an appropriate error message is returned.

tasks.title: Implement API endpoint for strategy retrieval by ID
tasks.description: Create a RESTful API endpoint to fetch a strategy based on its unique identifier.

tasks.title: Implement API endpoint for strategy retrieval by name
tasks.description: Create a RESTful API endpoint to fetch a strategy based on its name.

tasks.title: Develop database query for strategy retrieval
tasks.description: Write SQL queries or ORM methods to efficiently retrieve strategy data from the database.

tasks.title: Implement error handling for 'strategy not found'
tasks.description: Ensure proper error responses are returned when a requested strategy does not exist.

user_stories.title: As a system administrator, I want to ensure strategy persistence is robust so that trading strategies are not lost due to system failures.
user_stories.description: This technical story focuses on the reliability and integrity of the strategy data model and its persistence mechanism, including considerations for database backups, transactional integrity, and data recovery.
acceptance_criteria: All strategy create/update operations are ACID compliant.
Database backups for strategy data are configured and verifiable.
Strategy data is recoverable in case of a database failure.
Data model changes can be applied without data loss for existing strategies.

tasks.title: Implement database transactions for strategy operations
tasks.description: Ensure all CUD operations on strategies are wrapped in transactions.

tasks.title: Configure automated database backups
tasks.description: Set up a routine for backing up the strategy database.

tasks.title: Document database recovery procedures
tasks.description: Create a document outlining steps to restore strategy data from backups.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for data persistence layer
tasks.description: Develop tests to verify the correct saving and retrieval of strategies and their associated data.
